about_the_game:
The Story
You're lost in the mysterious mountain range known as Gravehollow Peaks, notorious known as the place that no traveler has ever returned from and is cursed with eternal snow.

To make matters worse, you're trapped with none other than your untrustworthy rival assassin, Seth, also known as The Deathstalker.

Deep within the mountain's caves, a beast lurks, and will do everything to make sure you and Seth die just as the other adventurers did. Can you change this disastrous fate and convince this creature not to kill you?

❆Multiple endings
❆10,000+ words
❆Female protagonist
❆1 dashing love interest
❆1 mischievous but lovable fairy-godmother
❆SFX and cinematic cut scenes


Play through this adventure and help them get out of Gravehollow Peaks! The choice is entirely yours.

Garden of Seif: Curse of Gravehollow Peaks is an alternate side story based on Garden of Seif: Chronicles of an Assassin.

content_descriptors.notes: Strong language, mild descriptions of violence, mild cartoon visuals of blood and violence, alcohol references, mentions of death, sexual references
